class_description:
Interface for read only XML Namespace context processing. An XML Namespace has the properties: example: <element xmlns:prefix="http://Namespace-name-URI"> All get*(*) methods operate in the current scope
 for Namespace URI and prefix resolution. Note that a Namespace URI can be bound to
 multiple prefixes in the current scope.  This can
 occur when multiple XMLConstants.XMLNS_ATTRIBUTE
 ("xmlns") Namespace declarations occur in the same Start-Tag and
 refer to the same Namespace URI. e.g. A prefix can only be bound to a single
 Namespace URI in the current scope.
